about_the_game:
Woodland Greens is a relaxing and casual mini-golf experience, perfect for short and enjoyable gameplay sessions. Step into a peaceful world inspired by the beauty of the British countryside, where each playthrough offers something new and exciting.



Every time you play, a brand-new course is procedurally generated, ensuring no two games are alike. Tackle slopes, navigate tricky obstacles like windmills and water ditches, and test your precision on challenging terrain. Beyond the traditional mini-golf experience, Woodland Greens encourages exploration with collectible stars scattered throughout the courses, adding an extra layer of fun and discovery.



With an almost limitless variety of randomly generated courses, Woodland Greens guarantees hours of laid-back enjoyment, whether you're aiming for a relaxing break or mastering the art of the perfect putt.

FEATURES


Woodland Greens offers a stress-free experience as all gameplay features are fully unlocked from the very beginning. There are no difficult or frustrating challenges required to unlock additional features.

  • Stylized hand-painted 3D artwork
  • Procedurally generated courses
  • 5 course sizes from 'Very Small' to 'Very Large'
  • Simple and accessible controls
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Almost 40 Steam achievements to attain

name: Woodland Greens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ Cores, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Escape into the serenity of the British countryside with Woodland Greens, a procedurally generated mini-golf experience. Relax, explore, and enjoy the beauty of nature as you swing your way through scenic trails and lush greenery.
